law.catch_line: Notice To Commissioner Of Appointment, Removal, Etc., Of Probation Officer
law.text: Upon the appointment, removal, retirement, resignation, death, or leave of absence of a probation officer, the clerk of the court by which said probation officer was appointed shall notify forthwith the commissioner of probation of such appointment, removal, retirement, resignation, death, or leave of absence.
